item.title: Nginx502错误
item.description: 问题/Problem nginx 在轉發中報錯日志為 ... upstream sent too big header while reading response header from upstream ... 原因/Reason 反向代理的源站HTTP頭太大了 proxy_buffer_size proxy_buffers proxy_busy_buffers_size http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_proxy_module.html 解决/Fix location \ { proxy_buffer_size 4k; proxy_buffers 4 256k; proxy_busy_buffers_size 256k; }
